name: The Dream of Yourself
description:
Introduction

"The Dream of Yourself" is about the discovery of the “other” in yourself, through a spiritual exploration of your subconsciousness.

Note

If you are interested you can participate in a short survey to answer questions about your preferences and experience playing this game. We would appreciate you giving detailed feedback about our game.

Thank you in advance!

Platforms
  • PC
Controls
  • WASD/L-STICK = Move
  • SHIFT/RT = Sprint
  • MOUSE/R-STICK = Look around
  • ALT+F4 to quit, sorry no menus yet
Links
  • Survey: https://forms.gle/o83mkJsX9zS9T33n9
